import React, { Component } from 'react' import Footer from '../layouts/admin/Footer' import Header from '../layouts/admin/Header' import Topbar from '../layouts/admin/Topbar' import Axios from 'axios'; export default class Profile extends Component { componentDidMount() { let token = localStorage.getItem('access_token'); const headers = { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'authorization': `${token}` }; Axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/admin/user-profile`,{ headers: headers }).then(res => { localStorage.setItem('access_token', res.accessToken) this.setState({ redirect: true }); }) .catch(error => { this.setState({ error: error.response.data.message }) console.log(error.response.data.message) }) } render() { return (
